item.title: How do i join a serever?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Next time post in the Question Section Please.

Ok download hamachi here. http://www.hamachi.cc/

Install it and enter everything that it requires.

Click the First botton on the bottom right. Should be “Join or Create networks”

To join, Find a serve that uses hamachi. Type in the Name like Example: TestScape1 password-test

Or to create on you make the name and the password.

Then enter the IP of the owner. Next to the owner of the server should be and IP. Enter that in the Moparscape 3.2 IP area.

Then enter your user name and password.

Make sure your using the right port. If not go to “File” --> “New Port” and enter the numbers of the port.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i join a serever?
